graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:MessageCreateInboxInput!)
{
	messageCreateInbox (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		messageId
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		sentAt
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	messageGetInboxes (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		sentAt
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	messageFindInbox (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		sentAt
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	messageFindInboxById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		sentAt
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:MessageUpdateInboxInput!)
{
	messageUpdateInbox (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		sentAt
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

graphql.query:
mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	messageDeleteInboxById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		sentAt
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	messageDeleteInboxes (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		sentAt
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
